DOC.brief_summary: The objective present work evaluate antihypertensive effect associate consumption ferment milk Lactococcus lactis NRRL-B50571 prehypertensive subject .
DOC.brief_title: Antihypertensive Effect Fermented Milk With Lactococcus Lactis Prehypertensive Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind randomized control clinical study 8-week intervention 36 hypertensive subject carry evaluate antihypertensive effect ferment milk Lactococcus lactis NRRL-B50571 . Once obtain informed consent ; volunteer randomize two group ( n=18 ) either receive 150 mL daily : ferment milk Lactococcus lactis NRRL-B50571 ( intervention group ) artificially acidified milk control ( placebo ) . Both drink consume daily . Participants ask change diet lifestyle intervention . We apply intention treat participant good adherence withdraw study . The outcomes group analyze use independent sample Student test , P value 0.05 less ( two side ) statistical significance ; use statistical software .
DOC.criteria: Systolic blood pressure > 130 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure > 85 mmHg Pregnant woman Cardiovascular diseases Diabetes Cancer Dairy allergy Lactose intolerance Patients receive angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor pharmacological therapy
